text: Bruno Flecker (born 14 August 1953) is an Austrian rower. He competed in the men's quadruple sculls event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Austrian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Austria Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers from Linz
title: Bruno Flecker
